item.title: The genius of Tesla's marketing strategy
item.description: Traditional advertising is less effective than ever before. It interrupts. It can’t get through ad blockers. We’ve learned to ignore it. Having fans sell your product is more effective than ever before. Tesla grasp this. They have zero advertising budget. The focus is on turning customers into fans. And it's fair to say they've succeeded:

item.title: Let your customers write your copy for you
item.description: The best copy reads like your customers wrote it. In the case of Design Academy, this is quite literally the case. On sign up you get sent an email asking “what is your biggest frustration with design?”

item.title: Using GIPHY for free brand awareness
item.description: All you need is a Giphy brand channel. Then any GIF you upload is publically available on Giphy's search engine. And there's nothing stopping you slipping in your logo, product, or even URL.

item.title: 6 keys to sharing content on Twitter
